title: Rasengan.js 1.0.0 Beta 🚀
author: Dilane3
body: Hello Developers 👋 My name is Dilane Kombou, I'm a JavaScript developer from Cameroon. I'm very excited to announce you that I released the first version of my own React Framework that I called Rasengan.js 🚀 Based on React and Vite, it provides to you a great experience for developing high-quality web application. It supports a major list of modern features of the web that you can have access of the Blog post, published on the official website of Rasengan.js. The project if open source, so you can check the code and even contribute to it without problem 😊 Resources Blog Post: Rasengan 1.0.0 Beta Documentation: Check it here Github: Access the repository on Github Community Follow Rasengan.js on Twitter Github: Join the Github Discussions Please check it out, leave me stars on Github and provide me feedback on the Github discussions to better enhance the framework. Thanks.
